籤詩版本二:
He kumumanaʻo, he puke, a he puke. Mai aʻa e hana ma hope o ka noʻonoʻo ʻana ma mua o ka noʻonoʻo ʻana.
Ke hiki mai ka manawa, hiki i nā kānaka hanohano ke kōkua iā ʻoe, a hiki iā ʻoe ke noho maluhia e like me ka gable.
詩意:
He pā kēia hale hexagram.
Ua palekana nā mea a pau a me ka pilikia ʻole.
解曰: E hana hou i kahi mea kahiko. Hui nā pua anu i ka pūnāwai. Ua ālai mua ʻia. I kēia manawa ua māʻona au.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Ua aʻo ʻo Liu Ji i ka Haku
I ka Ming Dynasty, ua hānau ʻia ʻo Liu Ji, nona ka inoa aloha ʻo Bowen a me ka inoa posthumous Wencheng, ma Qingtian (Wencheng County i kēia manawa), Zhejiang.
Heluhelu maikaʻi ʻo ia ma ka moʻolelo kahiko a me ka mōʻaukala, a maikaʻi hoʻi i ke kākau ʻana i nā mele a me nā ʻatikala. Ua mākaukau hoʻi ʻo ia i ka ʻike kilokilo a me ka ʻoihana koa a kōkua iā Zhu Yuanzhang e hoʻohui i ka honua.
I kēlā manawa, koho a alakaʻi ʻo Zhu Yuanzhang i kona mau koa i Anfeng, me ka manaʻo e hoʻomaha i ke kūlanakauhale ʻo Anfeng i hoʻopilikia ʻia.
Ua hele mai ʻo Liu Ji e hoʻohuli iā ia me ka wikiwiki, me ka manaʻo e pio ʻo ia ke hele ʻo ia i laila. E like me kā Liu Ji i manaʻo ai, ua paʻa ʻo Zhu Yuanzhang.
Ua hele mai ʻo Generals Xu Da lāua ʻo Chang Yuchun e hoʻopakele iā ia, a ua hiki iā Zhu Yuanzhang ke pakele.
聖意: Pōmaikaʻi no ka home a me ka hale, no ka mea nona iho, no ka waiwai, no ka pilikia pili kālā, no ka male ʻana, no nā wāhine e hele ana i Liujia, no ka oʻo hope ʻana o ka anuhe silika, no nā holoholona ʻeono, no ka loaʻa ʻana o nā kānaka, no ka hoʻopiʻi ʻana i ka lehulehu, no ka neʻe ʻana, no ka nalowale. waiwai a me ke ala ole, no na mai, no Yan'an mauna ilina, no ka pomaikai
古人: Ua ao aku o Liu Ji i ka Haku
第X籤: He iwakāluakūmāhiku i lanakila i ka hailona
